Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29750913] Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli(ATCC 25922)(MIC=16μM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 25923)(MIC=8μM);Bacillus subtilis(PY79)(MIC=8μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.29750913] C50 =6.3μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.C-terminal Modification: Amidation and Acylation (-NH-C₁₆H₃₃, conjugated with a n‑hexadecyl acyl chain)
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.
